name: CSV to AI Content
description: A Dataflow pipeline that reads from Pub/Sub, generates content with Vertex AI, and writes to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub subscription
parameters.help_text: The Pub/Sub subscription to read messages from.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery table
parameters.help_text: The BigQuery table to write results to.

parameters.name: product_images_bucket_name
parameters.label: Product images bucket name
parameters.help_text: The GCS bucket to store generated images in.

parameters.name: region
parameters.label: Region
parameters.help_text: The GCP region to run the Dataflow job in.
